entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing near midnight. Risk of a thundershower early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 1 except minus 4 in low lying areas.
